neverSuspendAudio.message: Never suspend tabs that are playing audio

neverSuspendActive.message: Never suspend active tab in each window

rememberLastActiveTab.message: Remember last active tab when switching to other apps

rememberLastActiveTabHelp.message: When switching from browser to other applications, protect the last active tab from being suspended

whitelistHelp.message: Tabs whose URL or domain matches anything in the list will never be suspended.

suspendedInstruction.message: Click here or press Ctrl+Shift+Z to reload this tab.

basicSettingsDesc.message: Configure basic tab suspension behavior and options

autoSuspendDesc.message: Set how long tabs should be idle before automatically suspending to save memory

memoryOptimizationDesc.message: Choose how to handle suspended tabs for optimal memory usage

nativeDiscardHelp.message: Use browser's built-in tab discarding feature for maximum memory savings, but tab state may not be fully preserved.

fixFaviconEnabledHelp.message: When a suspended tab shows no favicon after browser restart, try to reload it briefly and discard again to restore its favicon.

fixFaviconBatchSize.message: Max tabs to process per scan (0 = unlimited):

fixFaviconBatchSizeHelp.message: Limit how many tabs are processed each time the background scan runs. This helps avoid long processing when many tabs need fixes.

fixFaviconMaxRetriesHelp.message: Prevent infinite retries for tabs that cannot be fixed. Set 0 to disable the limit.

fixFaviconSectionDesc.message: Control how the extension tries to restore missing favicons on suspended tabs

whitelistDesc.message: Manage websites and domains that will never be suspended

whitelistHelpDetailed.message:
Enter one URL or domain per line. Examples:
• google.com - entire domain
• https://example.com/page - specific URL
• localhost - local development

confirmRemoveFromWhitelist.message: Are you sure you want to remove '%s' from the whitelist?

extDescription.message: Suspend inactive tabs to save memory using native discard or lightweight placeholder.

comingSoonDesc.message: More advanced settings are in development

privacyNoticeText.message: This extension only processes data locally and does not upload any information to external servers

tabMigrationDesc.message: Migrate suspended tabs from other tab suspension extensions

marvellousTabDetectionDesc.message: Automatically detect and provide migration for The Marvellous Suspender, The Great Suspender (notrack), The Great-er Tab Discarder, and other similar suspended tabs

scanForMarvellousTab.message: Scan for The Marvellous Suspender tabs

noMarvellousTabFound.message: No The Marvellous Suspender tabs found

tabSuspenderDetectionDesc.message: Automatically detect and provide migration for Tab Suspender suspended tabs

customTabDetectionDesc.message: Configure custom detection pattern for other suspended tab extensions

patternTestSuccess.message: Pattern test successful! Example URL parsed correctly.

patternTestFailed.message: Pattern test failed. Please check your configuration.

tabMigrationHelp.message: This feature allows you to convert suspended tabs from other tab suspension extensions (like The Marvellous Suspender) to ZeroRAM Suspender format, so you can continue using those tabs.

migrationTipDesc.message: This feature can automatically detect and migrate suspended tabs from other tab suspension extensions. It supports detecting both known and unknown variants. The scan state will be automatically reset each time you switch to this page.

licenseText.message: This extension is released under the GNU General Public License v3 (GPL v3). You are free to use, modify, and distribute this software under the terms of the GPL v3.

keyboardShortcutsDesc.message: View and manage extension keyboard shortcuts

shortcutsHelp.message: Below are the keyboard shortcuts configured for this extension. To modify shortcuts, click "Manage Shortcuts" to open Chrome's extension shortcuts page.

sessionManagementDesc.message: Export and import all tabs from all windows

exportSessionsDesc.message: Export all tabs from all windows to save your current browsing session

exportHelpTxt.message: TXT format: One URL per line, windows separated by blank lines

exportHelpJson.message: JSON format: Array of windows with title and URL for each tab

importSessionsDesc.message: Import tabs from previously exported session files

importAsSuspendedHelp.message: When enabled, imported tabs will be suspended immediately to save memory

importHelp.message: Supports TXT and JSON formats. TXT files should have one URL per line with blank lines separating windows. JSON files should contain an array of windows with tab objects.

exportSettingsDesc.message: Export all current extension settings to a JSON file for backup

exportSettingsHelp.message: Exports all settings including auto-suspend configuration, whitelist, and other preferences

importSettingsDesc.message: Import previously exported settings to restore your configuration

importSettingsHelp.message: Import settings from a previously exported JSON file. This will replace all current settings.

resetSettingsDesc.message: Reset all settings to their default values

resetWarning.message: This action will permanently delete all your current settings and restore defaults. This cannot be undone.

resetHelp.message: Consider exporting your current settings before resetting, in case you want to restore them later.

settingsReset.message: Settings have been reset to defaults

confirmResetSettings.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This action cannot be undone.

rateUs.message: ⭐ Rate us on Chrome Web Store

themeSettingsDesc.message: Choose the appearance theme for the suspended tab page

themeHelpText.message: The suspended tab page needs to be reloaded to apply the theme. Auto mode will follow your system's dark/light theme preference.

tabViewerDesc.message: View and manage all suspended tabs

suspendedTabsViewerDesc.message: View all suspended tabs across all windows and check their discard status

noSuspendedTabsDesc.message: No suspended tabs found. Suspended tabs are created when ZeroRAM Suspender puts tabs to sleep to save memory.
